name: Tangled Tales: The Misadventures of a Wizard's Apprentice
name_original: Tangled Tales: The Misadventures of a Wizard's Apprentice
description:
Tangled Tales: The Misadventures of a Wizard's Apprentice is an adventure game. It came out on 31-12-1989. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tangled Tales: The Misadventures of a Wizard's Apprentice is available on PC.
It was produced by Dallas Snell, Dallas Snell (game) and Jeff Hillhouse.
